casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darian Jaquan HARRIS. No. 472PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2006. Thomas R. Sallenger, Wilson, for Harris. Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of November 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 6th day of December 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2006."
